review_data.title: The greatest hits
review_data.content: I went tonight and eat there. Owner is from Sicilian. We have a good chat about Italian language. Food is great. I will return to eat here!

review_data.title: Wonderful restaurant
review_data.content: The best restaurant in Zurich airport. The owner is from Sicily. I went to eat here many times. The food is very greatm because it is authentic Italian cuisine. The service is good friendly. I will come back again.

review_data.title: Agree with other reviewers, this is a NO 😩

review_data.title: Just ok

review_data.title: Sehr lecker, sehr netter Chef!
review_data.content: Abendessen mit der ganzen Familie vor dem Abflug am nächsten Morgen. Die absolut richtige Wahl, jederzeit wieder zu empfehlen.

review_data.title: Pizza Calzone and more

review_data.title: Great service

review_data.title: Average pizza slow service
review_data.content: Went theredi for lunch and had pizza funghi. Pizza is just average, not untasty but nothing good. Service is slow even most tables were empty. Considering the environment and food, I think its slightly overpriced.

review_data.title: Only restaurant by the Dorint Hotel
review_data.content: Our family ate here because it was the only restaurant in the area. The pizza and pasta were good and the prices not bad. Not sure if I would have chosen to eat here if there were more restaurants in the area.

review_data.title: Gut und gerne wieder

review_data.title: A handy place if you're at the Ibis next door
review_data.content: The pizza was OK and big enough for two not very hungry people. Cost 20 CHF. My advice - stay away from the wine - not very good and very expensive. The beer on other tables looked good. Friendly efficient service. No atmosphere.

review_data.title: good

review_data.title: Gutes Essen
review_data.content: Rascher, guter, aufmerksamer Service. Essen gut. Grosse Auswahl an Pizza, Pasta, Salaten etc. Preis-/Leistungsverhältnis ist gut.

review_data.title: night before flight out the following morning

review_data.title: Excellent - highly recommended
